attributes.action: ignore any and all e-petitions from religious 'martyrs'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a prevailing attitude amongst the religious community, particularly but not exclusively Christians, that their religions and beliefs are automatically under attack - the so-called 'built-in martyr complex'. This is nothing more than paranoia stemming from insecurity.

I call for the Prime Minister, in his wisdom, to ignore all e-petitions that have been created as a direct result of such paranoia.

rejection.details: Please email your comments on petitions to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
